participant_1.background:
I make time for myself to work out and eat healthy, even if it's just a 30-minute walk every day.
i do not have much energy.
my weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.
i want a porsche.
I was snorkeling last week and a sea turtle swam right up next to me

participant_2.background:
My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like.
I don't mind the rain, because it helps me drown out my terrible singing voice.
In my free time, I like to go on road trips with my Ford truck.
I am a person who likes to express myself through tattoos and music.
i have been in band all four years of high school.

content.text: Doing alright, not much to report. How was your weekend?
Pretty good. I went to a family reunion with my siblings and parents. We had a lot of fun and ate a lot of good food. How about you?
I was pretty busy. I had a lot of studying to do for my upcoming exams. I also went snorkeling with my friends. It was really cool to see all the sea turtles swimming around.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you had a good time. I've never been snorkeling before, but it sounds like it would be really cool.
It was definitely a lot of fun. I'd definitely recommend it if you ever get the chance.
I'll have to keep that in mind. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go on road trips with my Ford truck. I also like to express myself through tattoos and music. I've been in band all four years of high school.
That sounds really cool. I've always wanted to get a tattoo, but I'm not sure what I would get.
It's definitely a big decision. You want to make sure you get something that you're going to love for the rest of your life.
Yeah, that's what I'm worried about. I don't want to regret it later on.
You could always start out with a small tattoo and see how you feel about it. Then, if you like it, you can always get something bigger later on.
That's a good idea. I'll have to think about it.
No problem. I'm here if you have any questions.
